challenges.name: Results summary component
challenges.task: Design a component to show a result summary
challenges.desc:
The aim of this challenge is to reproduce a component to display the scores obtained in different categories.
Frontend Mentors provides the score, name and icon for each category.
They are loaded when the page loads and used to populate all the fields.`inline code`
